explanation: [0-0] On a city street, a red spider train is parked with a creepy smile on its face. The rear of a yellow car is visible in the upper right corner, and some buildings and yellow guardrails on the roadside can be seen in the background.

[0-2] First, the camera zooms out to show the red spider train grabbing the ground with its eight legs and shaking its body up and down. The camera pans to the right, showing the red spider train lying on the street, still shaking its body. A yellow taxi is parked above it, with houses, buildings, and a gray sidewalk further up.
